explains: n. 策略，手法；战术，兵法（tactics）
adj. 按顺序的，依次排列的

sentences.en: It's thought the fires were started by the prisoners as a diversionary tactic.
sentences.cn: 人们认为火是囚犯们放的，是一种使人分心的策略。

sentences.en: One tactic involves where to display the goods.
sentences.cn: 其中一个策略涉及到在哪里展示商品。

sentences.en: This was the first time he'd used the card tactic.
sentences.cn: 这是他第一次使用纸牌策略。
